item.description:
Please Note The Date and Time Change.

The All Star Party takes Place at Game On, Thursday, April 15 at 6 pm. If you are a Game On All Star then you know what this is all about. If not, I suggest that you check it out and join.

You could win Sox Marathon Monday Monster Tickets!

More info is available at www.gameonboston.com

If you want to attend be my guest (Frank - Red Sox Natives) Ask for Beth.

Or RSVP to Beth at banthony@lyonsgroup.com
item.name: All Star Party at Game On - Win Marathon Monday Monster Tickets from Native Beth
